channel.title: Lin-Manuel Miranda on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Conjuring: Last Rites’ Jolts Box Office Back to Life With Colossal $83M U.S. Bow, $187M Globally
item.description: The pic scored the third-best Hollywood horror opening of all time domestically and the best-ever overseas, among other records. The rerelease of Lin-Manuel Miranda’s ‘Hamilton’ is also singing loudly

item.title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ Jolts Box Office Back to Life, Now Targeting Colossal $75M-Plus Opening
item.description: New Line’s horror pic is blowing up at the box office in a much-needed boost for theater owners. The rerelease of Lin-Manuel Miranda’s ‘Hamilton’ is also singing loudly.

item.title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ Jolts Box Office Back to Life, Now Targeting Colossal $75M-Plus Opening
item.description: New Line’s horror pic is blowing up at the box office in a much-needed boost for theater owners. The rerelease of Lin-Manuel Miranda’s ‘Hamilton’ is also singing loudly.

item.title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ Jolts Box Office Back to Life, Now Targeting Record $65M-Plus Opening
item.description: The horror pic is blowing up at the Friday box office after earning a franchise-best $8.5 million in Thursday previews. The re-release of Lin-Manuel Miranda’s ‘Hamilton’ is also singing loudly.

item.title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ Jolts Box Office Back to Life, Now Targeting Record $65M-Plus Opening
item.description: The horror pic is blowing up at the Friday box office after earning a franchise-best $8.5 million in Thursday previews. The re-release of Lin-Manuel Miranda’s ‘Hamilton’ is also singing loudly.

item.title: ‘Hamilton’ Movie Sets September Theatrical Release
item.description: On Tuesday’s episode of “The Tonight Show,” Lin-Manuel Miranda revealed that the movie version of his Tony Award-winning musical “Hamilton” will come to theaters on Sept.

item.title: ‘Hamilton’ Movie Sets September Theatrical Release
item.description: On Tuesday’s episode of “The Tonight Show,” Lin-Manuel Miranda revealed that the movie version of his Tony Award-winning musical “Hamilton” will come to theaters on Sept.

item.title: ‘Hamilton’ Celebrates 10 Years With Luxury Cashmere Sweaters, Handstitched With the Show’s Most Iconic Lines
item.description: Some of the most quotable lines from Lin-Manuel Miranda’s “Hamilton” are handstitched across luxury cashmere sweaters in a new collaboration with New York-based brand Lingua Franca.

item.title: ‘Hamilton’ Celebrates 10 Years With Luxury Cashmere Sweaters, Handstitched With the Show’s Most Iconic Lines
